scannerStates.positioning:
Place your head in 
 the mind-scanner!
scannerStates.pending:
Calculating the token hash 
 in your memory block!
scannerStates.success:
Hash found, token recorded 
 and extracted to your account!
scannerStates.error:
Strain your brain! 
 Help find the token!)))
scannerStates.cameraIsNotAllowed: You have given up mining! But you can earn $DICE by inviting friends and completing tasks!
scannerStates.cameraIsNotAllowdReg: To register, you need to create a mental image. Please turn on the camera

inviteText.part1: Get a fixed bonus up to 5K
inviteText.part3: Each time your friend receives a reward, 10% of their reward is also paid to you. In addition, 2% of the reward of your friend's friends will also be paid to you!

friendList.empty: There is no one here yet

registration.instructions: To register, you will need to create a mental image. To do this, follow the instructions on the next page. Attention! Your face should be clearly visible on the scanner when you repeat to yourself 'I want to get a lot of $DICE'!

scannerStates.positioning: Align your face with the mind scanner and repeat to yourself the phrase - 'I want to get a lot of $DICE tokens!'
scannerStates.pending: The mind scanner is calculating your mental image.
scannerStates.error: Attention! Mental field distortion, try again!

video.header: Publish a video of the token mining process
video.description: Videos are created automatically daily. To create a video, you need to mine tokens at least 10 times!

voucher.header: Buy and hold a voucher from premarket
voucher.description: Buy and hold a voucher from premarket

telegramRedirect.title: Better Experience in Telegram
telegramRedirect.description: This game works best in Telegram. Click below to open in Telegram.
